name: PROBLEM_STAGE_UPDATES
description: Stores a history of changes made to the "No Stage Required" flag for problems on a patient's problem list.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_NO_STG_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the history of reasons that a problem was not staged.

columns.name: HX_NO_STG_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the history of comments for a problem that was not staged.

columns.name: HX_NO_STG_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the history of users that marked a problem as not needing a stage.

columns.name: HX_NO_STG_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HX_NO_STG_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the history of instants that a problem was marked as not needing a stage.
